title: Abigail Breslin Wears Sexy Crimson Dress, Shows Under Boob at Pre-2015 Emmys Party--See Photos
content:
View Gallery     Andreas Branch/Variety/REX Shutterstock   
Little Miss Sunshine, oh my! 

Former child star Abigail Breslin , who wowed audiences with her performance in the 2006 film, struck an ultra sexy pose at  Variety and Women in Film's pre-2015 Emmys party, sponsored by Mercedes-Benz and Fiji Water, in Los Angeles on Friday night. 

The 19-year-old actress, who can be seen in the new series  Scream Queens , donned a skintight, shimmering crimson knee-length cut-out dress that showed a bit of under boob, marking one of her most daring looks. She completed the outfit with black, strappy platform stiletto sandals. 

Breslin was joined at the event by a slew of popular TV stars, such as Modern Family 's  Ariel Winter and  Sarah Hyland and their onscreen mom  Julie Bowen ,  Orange Is the New Black  actresses  Taryn Manning ,  Danielle Brooks ,  Laverne Cox and  Jackie Cruz ,  Once Upon a Time 's Lana Parrilla  and   Game of Thrones '  Gwendoline Christie and  Alfie Allen . (See ). 
 Andreas Branch/Variety/REX Shutterstock    Andreas Branch/Variety/REX Shutterstock   
"So stoked I got to meet @daniebb3 tonight at the Women in Film @variety party!" Breslin said about Brookes. "Been binge watching Orange Is The New Black all week! Luhv her. #Taystee." 
 
The 2015 Emmys will air live on Sunday on FOX at 8 p.m. ET / 5 p.m. PT. 

E!'s Emmy Awards coverage starts on Sunday at 4:30 p.m. ET/ 1:30 p.m. PT with Countdown to the Red Carpet , followed by Live From the Red Carpet at 6 p.m. ET/ 3 p.m. PT. 

Plus, watch Fashion Police 's 2015 Primetime Emmy Awards Special on Monday at 8 p.m., only on E!
